item.description:
Plans for the March on the Pentagon are moving forward in the Eastern Mass area. We are beginning to check into buses, initiate publicity and discuss fund raising in this area. Volunteers are needed. At its recent meeting, the New England United regional antiwar network voted to form a March 21 Mobilization Committee to coordinate the effort in building our participation in the March on the Pentagon in Washington, DC on March 21.

At our meeting on Saturday, the March 21 Mobilization Committee – Eastern Mass voted to hold our next meeting on
Sunday, February 1, at 2:00 PM
Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Avenue, 5th Floor
Boston, MA
(Chinatown Stop on the Orange Line T)

All are invited to participate. At our meeting we will be discussing the March 21 action as well as other activities pertaining to the antiwar movement locally, regionally, and nationally. Please bring your energy, enthusiasm, and ideas.

For more information on the action please visit:
http://www.natassembl...

Proposed Agenda:
1) Introductions, selection of chair, and note taker
2) National Action in DC and Movement in General
3) Messaging locally
4) Web site, Facebook, other electronic tools
5) Outreach/Endorsers
6) Buses
7) Finances
8) Time and organization of next meeting
Adjourn
item.name: March 21 Mobilization Committee – Eastern Mass meeting
